PageTitle: reset cpu-defend car cross-board statistics slot
FuncDef: The reset cpu-defend car cross-board statistics slot command deletes statistics about inter-board traffic CAR.
CLIs: reset cpu-defend car cross-board statistics slot <slot-id>
Examples: <HUAWEI> reset cpu-defend car cross-board statistics slot 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the statistics about inter-board traffic CAR, run the reset cpu-defend car cross-board statistics slot command to delete the existing statistics before running the display cpu-defend car cross-board statistics command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
